data.title: Penguinese
data.statement:
During a trip to Antarctica, you find Pingu the penguin. Problem, you don't get a word of what he says... Code the translator from English to Penguinese ("NootNoot").
Note that a word becomes <<Noot>> in Penguinese and a digit become <<noot>> as many times as the digit

For example : 

Hello World ------ > Noot Noot
          1          ------ > noot
          2          ------ > nootnoot
          n         ------- > n * noot
        123       ------- > noot nootnoot nootnootnoot

Notice that there is no mix of digits and letters

testCases.title: message & digit
testCases.testIn:
2
My boat is 2 hours from here
Would you come with me
testCases.testOut:
Noot Noot Noot nootnoot Noot Noot Noot
Noot Noot Noot Noot Noot

testCases.title: Other message & digit
testCases.testIn:
2
My boat is 3 hours from here
Would you come with me
testCases.testOut:
Noot Noot Noot nootnootnoot Noot Noot Noot
Noot Noot Noot Noot Noot

testCases.title: number & message
testCases.testOut:
noot nootnoot nootnootnootnootnootnootnoot nootnootnootnoot Noot
nootnoot nootnootnootnootnootnoot noot nootnootnootnootnootnootnoot Noot

testCases.title: other number
testCases.testOut:
noot nootnoot nootnootnootnootnootnootnootnoot nootnootnootnoot Noot
nootnoot nootnootnootnootnootnoot nootnoot nootnootnootnootnootnootnoot Noot

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read message:string(200)
write Noot
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 : >> The number [[n]] of sentences to translate

<<[[n]] next lines : >> The sentence [[message]] to translate

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

During a trip to Antarctica, you find Pingu the penguin. Problem, you don't get a word of what he says... Code the translator from English to Penguinese ("NootNoot").
Note that a word becomes Noot in Penguinese and a digit become noot as many times as the digit

For example :

Hello World ------ > Noot Noot
1 ------ > noot
2 ------ > nootnoot
n ------- > n * noot
123 ------- > noot nootnoot nootnootnoot

Notice that there is no mix of digits and letters
Input
Line 1 : The number n of sentences to translate

n next lines : The sentence message to translate
Output
n lines : The nth message translated
Constraints
0 < n < 10
0 < length(message) < 200
Example
Input
1
Hello World
Output
Noot Noot
